Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.server

Class ReconnectionHandler

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.server.ReconnectionHandler
public class ReconnectionHandler extends Object
This class is used to manage the persistence mechanism
Author:
Dario d'Abate

    • ReconnectionHandler

      public ReconnectionHandler(MultiServer server)
      Default constructor used to create a new Reconnection handler object
      Parameters:
      server - server object that instantiates ReconnectionHandler object

    • ReconnectionHandler

      public ReconnectionHandler(MultiServer server, int nextId, Map<ArrayList<String>,Integer> gameIdByUserMap)
      Constructor used to reload data from a previous ReconnectionHandler object
      Parameters:
      server - server object that instantiates ReconnectionHandler object
      nextId - previous nextId
      gameIdByUserMap - previous gameIdUserMap

  • Method Details

    • reconnectPlayer

      public void reconnectPlayer(ServerClientHandler clientHandler) throws IOException
      This method is used to handle the reconnection of a valid player in the game he was playing
      Parameters:
      clientHandler - client handler associated to a player
      Throws:
      IOException

    • broadcastMessage

      public void broadcastMessage(int idOfAGame, String msg) throws IOException
      This method sends a message to all the reconnected players that belongs to a specified game
      Parameters:
      idOfAGame - id of the game to which the players belong
      msg - message sent
      Throws:
      IOException

    • alreadyLogged

      public boolean alreadyLogged(String nickname)
      This method check if used to check if a player has already reconnected
      Parameters:
      nickname - nickname to check
      Returns:
      false if the nickname belongs to a player that has not yet reconnected, true otherwise

    • containPlayer

      public boolean containPlayer(String player)
      This method is used to check if the nick of a player is between those of disconnected player
      Parameters:
      player - nickname of the user to check
      Returns:
      true if the nickname belongs to a user that was disconnected from a started game, false otherwise

    • getInitialOrder

      public ArrayList<String> getInitialOrder(String nickname)
      This method is used to retrieve the list of players that was originally disconnected
      Parameters:
      nickname - nickname of one of the players
      Returns:
      list of players that was originally disconnected if the nick has correspondence, null otherwise

    • addGame

      public void addGame(Game game, ArrayList<String> playersNick)
      This method saves a game session on disk, binding it to the list of related player. Thus, it saves the attributes of this class on disk, because they are modified
      Parameters:
      game - game to be saved on disk
      playersNick - list of nickname of players that started that game

    • remove

      public void remove(String nickPlayer)
      This method is used to remove all the participant of a game from the map because they won a game. If the map does not contain that nickname it does nothing
      Parameters:
      nickPlayer - nickname of one of the player to remove
